sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_898924_rounds.RoundUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RoundUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var RoundUtils = Class.create();
RoundUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDateTime: function() {
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		// get date and time value in the current users display format and time zone
		var currentDateAndTime = rightnow.getDisplayValue();
		return currentDateAndTime;
	},

    type: 'RoundUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-11 02:37:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>9cb1825c9766111016901c800153afaf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RoundUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rounds" source="x_898924_rounds">da3ba8149722111016901c800153af5e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Rounds">da3ba8149722111016901c800153af5e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9cb1825c9766111016901c800153afaf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-11 02:37:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
